Text.Page:
The arachnens breed faster than we can kill them. The ones here in Tor Exsul seem to subsist on sheep.

Are you willing to deprive them of their supper? Bring any dead sheep you find to the Manafire Outpost, and we'll burn them.
If the arachnens are starving, maybe it'll take their minds off of breeding. Or maybe we'll get lucky, and they'll start eating each other!
The arachnens aren't going to miss these few sheep. We'll need more than that if we're going to starve those monsters out.
